trans-unit.source: Enables sending data to a Web service from within a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 能夠將資料從工作流程傳送至 Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity can only be included in a workflow that has a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> 活動只能包含在具有 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> 活動的工作流程中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity requires that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.InputActivityNameProperty> is set, and only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activities located in the same workflow are valid values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> 活動需要已設定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.InputActivityNameProperty>，且只有位於相同工作流程中的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> 活動為有效值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity models the return value of a Web service method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> 活動會將 Web 服務方法呼叫的傳回值模型化。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to be paired with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> that represents the input parameters to a Web service method call.
trans-unit.target: 它會與代表 Web 服務方法呼叫之輸入參數的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> 配對。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activities are used only if the method on the Web service interface contract contains a return value.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 Web 服務介面合約上的方法包含傳回值時，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> 活動才能夠使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the preceding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定之前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> 類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the preceding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 之前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> 類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> is matched with.
trans-unit.target: 定義與這個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> 相符之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of bindings associated with the out/ref and return value of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 out/ref 相關聯的繫結集合，並傳回所對應 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> 方法的值。

trans-unit.source: This collection is used to bind the outbound parameters to locations in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合用來將傳出參數繫結至工作流程中的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> executes, it extracts the values from the bound locations and delivers these back to the blocked Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 執行時，它會從傳出位置擷取值，並將這些值傳遞回封鎖的 Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.ParameterBindings" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.ParameterBindings" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> sends output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> 傳送輸出至用戶端之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity sends the output of the Web service invocation.
trans-unit.target: 定義在活動傳送 Web 服務引動過程之輸出前執行的事件委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 的物件，該提供者可在需要設計階段服務時提供相關存取權。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之屬性的存取類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> enumeration value denoting the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性存取層級的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結。

trans-unit.source: Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個介面，會直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 的物件，該提供者可在需要設計階段服務時提供相關存取權。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the property whose name is passed as the <paramref name="propertyName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，其名稱會作為 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 參數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結。
